Weekly Recap: June 19 - 25

Published on 25 Jun 2023
#weekly-recap

This was originally posted to my Now page, but I‚Äôm moving all of those updated to the blog. Here‚Äôs what I got up to this week:

  • Making: so many yarn cozies and summer tops
  • Listening to: all the knitting podcasts on YouTube! I feel like there's a huge new crop of knitting podcasts from the pandemic. I haven't watched knitting podcasts since 2018, so it's really cool to see more diversity.
  • Reading: Witch King by Martha Wells - I loved Wells' Murderbot series, so I decided to try her recent fantasy release. It's quite different than her other work, but I'm enjoying it so far.
  • Celebrating: getting a bunch of new dresses that make me feel cute as heck, which is a very rare experience both in terms of finding clothes off the rack as a small fat person in Japan and feeling cute despite body dysmorphia.
  • Looking forward to: traveling Europe next month to scout for possible new places to live with my partner. We've got a bunch of great, vegan-friendly places on the list, and I'm hoping we have a great first impressions.

Next post: Knitting the Faye Summer Top »
